body:
@tgamblin 

> mark petsc and trilinos with more specific depends_on() constraints. Seems like they need to say:
> 
> ```
>     depends_on('SuperLU_DIST@:4.3', when='@:<some version>')
>     depends_on('SuperLU_DIST@5:', when='@<some version++>:')
> ```

or from a certain version they may support both `4.3.` and `5.0`.
title: check which versions (if any) of petsc/trilinos supports Superlu_dist 5.0
